text.__SUMMARY__: Gymnopilus rufescens is a species of mushroom in the Cortinariaceae family.
text.Description:
The cap is 1 to 1.5 centimetres (0.4 to 0.6 in) in diameter.
Microscopic characteristics
text.Habitat and distribution: Gymnopilus rufescens grows on conifer wood, and has been found in California during December.
